TypeSignature.Value: public class DuplexClientBase<TChannel> : System.ServiceModel.ClientBase<TChannel> where TChannel : class
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DuplexClientBase`1<class TChannel> extends System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1<!TChannel>
Public Class DuplexClientBase(Of TChannel) Inherits ClientBase(Of TChannel)
generic <typename TChannel> where TChannel : classpublic ref class DuplexClientBase : System::ServiceModel::ClientBase<TChannel>
type DuplexClientBase<'Channel (requires 'Channel : null)> = class inherit ClientBase<'Channel (requires 'Channel : null)>

span.span: The type of the channel to be created.

summary.span: 用於建立雙工服務通道並將該通道與回呼物件相關聯。

span.span: Used to create a channel to a duplex service and associate that channel with a callback object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 類別來建立可指定回呼物件的服務通道。Use the class to create a channel to a service that specifies a callback object. 物件會包裝物件，提供 WCF 物件的連線。The object wraps a object, which provides the connectivity for the WCF object. 您可以使用任何一種型別來連接雙工服務。You can use either type to connect to a duplex service. 如需雙工服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[雙工服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/duplex-services.md)。For more information about duplex services, see [Duplex Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/duplex-services.md). 給衍生自此類別之 Managed C++ 使用者的特別說明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 請將您的清除程式碼置於 (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort)，而不是解構函式。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用解構函式：它們會導致編譯器自動產生 Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate - 避免使用非參考成員：它們會導致編譯器自動產生 Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate - 避免使用完成項；但是假如您加入一個完成項，就應該抑制建置警告並呼叫來自 (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) 的 和完成項，以模擬原本可能自動產生的 行為。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) in order to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用用戶端的工的 WCF 用戶端類型，在`SampleDuplexHelloClient`、 將新與回呼物件來接聽回呼的物件。The following example shows the use in the client of a duplex WCF client type, the `SampleDuplexHelloClient`, to pass a new object with the callback object to listen for callbacks. [!code-csharp[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks WCF 會建立新物件使用`callbackInstance`物件，以處理所有回呼作業。WCF creates a new object using the `callbackInstance` object to handle all callback operations.
